### [UwU-CLI](https://github.com/ThunderConstellations/UwU-Cli)
**The Ultimate Chaotic CMD Replacement** - A fully-featured, AI-powered, context-aware CMD replacement that combines the functionality of CMD with Clink autosuggestions, chaotic UwU energy, automatic clapbacks, and AI assistance.

**Key Features:**
- ğŸ¤– **AI Integration** - OpenRouter API powered by DeepSeek R1 0528
- ğŸ¨ **Toxic Themes & UI** - Oh-My-Zsh style themes with ASCII effects
- ğŸ”Œ **Plugin System** - Extensible architecture with hot reloading
- ğŸ¯ **Productivity Features** - Smart context detection and command chaining
- ğŸ–¥ï¸ **Enhanced CMD Replacement** - Full compatibility with autosuggestions
